overview: Includes brand new interviews with the band and a track by track analysis from those who were there. BONUS VIDEOS 1. ‘Screamadelica’ 2. ‘Movin’ On Up’ 3. ‘Slip Inside This House’ 4. ‘Don’t Fight It, Feel It’ 5. ‘Higher Than The Sun’ 6. ‘Come Together’ 7. ‘Damaged’ 8. ‘Loaded’ 9. ‘Shine Like Stars’ 10. ‘Inner Flight’
title: The Making Of Screamadelica
